sentences.english: In the various sects of Tibetan Buddhism, the Gelug Sect is the latest to form one.
sentences.chinese: 在藏傳佛教的各個教派中，格魯派是最晚形成的一個。

sentences.english: The following day, my vajra brother told me he believed he was sexually abused ( !
sentences.chinese: 所以我個人認爲象格魯派這樣不鼓勵伏藏是對的。

definition: another name for Sakyamuni 釋迦牟尼佛|释迦牟尼佛, the historical Buddha
Chinese Buddhist school founded on the Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra (Garland sutra)
Feast of All Souls (fifteenth day of seventh lunar month) (Buddhism)
